description:
Multi Donor Programme -
Support to Indonesia’s Democratic Elections

subproject.corporate outcome: Electoral laws, processes and institutions strengthen inclusive participation and professional electoral administration
subproject.description: -Support the development of electoral procedures and administration; - Facilitate operational training for election workers; - Assist KPU’s media and public relations, and establish an Election Results Centre; - Support electoral oversight and dispute resolution; - Support the development and implementation of regulations for local elections
subproject.title: Electoral Management Body

subproject.description: -Support the development of electoral procedures and administration; - Facilitate operational training for election workers; - Assist KPU’s media and public relations, and establish an Election Results Centre; - Support electoral oversight and dispute resolution; - Support the development and implementation of regulations for local elections
subproject.title: Electoral Management Body

subproject.corporate outcome: Electoral laws, processes and institutions strengthen inclusive participation and professional electoral administration
subproject.description: - Conduct assessment of voters’ education and information needs; - Develop a Voters’ education and information manual/guideline booklet; - Provide technical assistance to the relevant agencies of the Government of Indonesia to conduct mass media voters’ education and information campaign; - Administer CSO Voters’ Information and Education Grants Scheme; - Undertake two-step training programme to support CSOs to utilise the Grants Scheme
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Promoting political awareness

subproject.corporate outcome: Electoral laws, processes and institutions strengthen inclusive participation and professional electoral administration
subproject.description: - Assist in post-election evaluation and development of KPU’s Strategic Plan; - Establish a multi-functional Electoral Resource and Information Centre; - Assist the Government of Indonesia in the development of a permanent voter registry; - Establish a long-term professional development programme; - Support the KPU in establishing international technical cooperation.
subproject.title: Function of Electoral Body

subproject.corporate outcome: Electoral laws, processes and institutions strengthen inclusive participation and professional electoral administration
subproject.description: - Assist in post-election evaluation and development of KPU’s Strategic Plan; - Establish a multi-functional Electoral Resource and Information Centre; - Assist the Government of Indonesia in the development of a permanent voter registry; - Establish a long-term professional development programme; - Support the KPU in establishing international technical cooperation.
subproject.title: Function of Electoral Body

subproject.corporate outcome: Electoral laws, processes and institutions strengthen inclusive participation and professional electoral administration
subproject.description: - Support ongoing efforts and strategies of multiple stakeholders with their electoral education activities; - Institutionalise long-term multi stakeholders’ initiatives on electoral education
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Electoral education

subproject.corporate outcome: Electoral laws, processes and institutions strengthen inclusive participation and professional electoral administration
subproject.description: - Support ongoing efforts and strategies of multiple stakeholders with their electoral education activities; - Institutionalise long-term multi stakeholders’ initiatives on electoral education
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Electoral education

subproject.corporate outcome: Electoral laws, processes and institutions strengthen inclusive participation and professional electoral administration
subproject.description: - Support ongoing efforts of the Government of Indonesia to coordinate donors’ long-term electoral assistance; - Facilitate the establishment of a permanent donor coordination facility on elections and other democratic institutions.
subproject.title: Donor coordination facility

subproject.corporate outcome: Electoral laws, processes and institutions strengthen inclusive participation and professional electoral administration
subproject.description: - Support ongoing efforts of the Government of Indonesia to coordinate donors’ long-term electoral assistance; - Facilitate the establishment of a permanent donor coordination facility on elections and other democratic institutions.
subproject.title: Donor coordination facility

title: Support to Indonesia's Democratic Elections
